textAfterTable: Alvin's PXB Portable Drawing Boards incorporate a heavy-duty, one-piece handle with built-in legs that have dual snap lock mechanisms. The spring tension crosswire parallelogram design provides effortless movement and perfect parallel motion of the straightedge. PXB boards are made of solid wood board with a smooth, white Melamine surface and a pre-installed aluminum straightedge. Shipping Rates All orders are charged actual shipping rates. Available shipping options for each order will be calculated during the checkout process based on package dimensions and destination. You will have the opportunity to review the shipping fees for your order before finalizing and submitting your order. For full shipping details and options see our shipping page at http://www.aswexpress.com/information/shipping.html. Oversized orders Certain items and large orders ship via LTL (less than truckload) with reduced ground rates inside the contiguous 48 states. Turnaround times Most orders leave our warehouse in 24-48 hours. Orders received before 11:00 AM EST on a weekday will most likely ship the same business day contingent upon warehouse volume.
